languages.text: "Когда-то Калькасар натолкнулся на моего брата, который так же стал Вульфеном. Он изловил его и доставил на Фенрис — вот долг, за который мы явились платить. Но у нас нет возможности свершить такое, а значит, придется даровать брату Игнильфу покой".

"Calcazar once encountered another of my brothers, who had also become a Wulfen. Calcazar captured him and brought him to Fenris — that is the debt we came here to pay. But we have no way of doing what Calcazar did, so we will have to grant Brother Ignilf peace."
languages.original_text: "Когда-то Калькасар натолкнулся на моего брата, который так же стал Вульфеном. Он изловил его и доставил на Фенрис — вот долг, за который мы явились платить. Но у нас нет возможности свершить такое, а значит, придется даровать брату Игнильфу покой".

traits.locale_text: "Calcazar once encountered another of my brothers, who had also become a Wulfen. Calcazar captured him and brought him to Fenris — that is the debt we came here to pay. But we have no way of doing what Calcazar did, so we will have to grant Brother Ignilf peace."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Calcazar once encountered another of my brothers, who had also become a Wulfen. Calcazar captured him and brought him to Fenris — that is the debt we came here to pay. But we have no way of doing what Calcazar did, so we will have to grant Brother Ignilf peace."

traits.locale_text: "Calcazar once encountered another of my brothers, who had also become a Wulfen. Calcazar captured him and brought him to Fenris — that is the debt we came here to pay. But we have no way of doing what Calcazar did, so we will have to grant Brother Ignilf peace."

traits.locale_text: "Calcazar once encountered another of my brothers, who had also become a Wulfen. Calcazar captured him and brought him to Fenris — that is the debt we came here to pay. But we have no way of doing what Calcazar did, so we will have to grant Brother Ignilf peace."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “卡尔卡扎曾经遇到过我的另外一位兄弟，那个人已经变成了狼人。卡尔卡扎抓住了他，把他带到了芬里斯，因此我们欠了他个人情，必须来科罗努斯扩区偿还。不过，我们没办法像卡尔卡扎那样抓住伊格尼夫兄弟，因此我们只能让他获得解脱。”
languages.original_text: "Calcazar once encountered another of my brothers, who had also become a Wulfen. Calcazar captured him and brought him to Fenris — that is the debt we came here to pay. But we have no way of doing what Calcazar did, so we will have to grant Brother Ignilf peace."

traits.locale_text: “卡尔卡扎曾经遇到过我的另外一位兄弟，那个人已经变成了狼人。卡尔卡扎抓住了他，把他带到了芬里斯，因此我们欠了他个人情，必须来科罗努斯扩区偿还。不过，我们没办法像卡尔卡扎那样抓住伊格尼夫兄弟，因此我们只能让他获得解脱。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「カルカサルはかつて奴とは別の、俺の同胞に遭ったが、そいつもウルフェンになってた。カルカサルはウルフェンを捕えてフェンリスに連れてきた…それで借りができたもんだから、俺たちはここに来たんだ。しかし、カルカサルがウルフェンを捕えた手段を持たない俺らは、ブラザー・イグニリフを安らかに送ってやるしかないのさ」
languages.original_text: "Calcazar once encountered another of my brothers, who had also become a Wulfen. Calcazar captured him and brought him to Fenris — that is the debt we came here to pay. But we have no way of doing what Calcazar did, so we will have to grant Brother Ignilf peace."

traits.locale_text: 「カルカサルはかつて奴とは別の、俺の同胞に遭ったが、そいつもウルフェンになってた。カルカサルはウルフェンを捕えてフェンリスに連れてきた…それで借りができたもんだから、俺たちはここに来たんだ。しかし、カルカサルがウルフェンを捕えた手段を持たない俺らは、ブラザー・イグニリフを安らかに送ってやるしかないのさ」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Calcazar una vez se encontró con otro de mis hermanos que también se había convertido en Wulfen. Calcazar logró capturarlo y traerlo a Fenris, y esa es la deuda que vinimos a saldar. Pero no tenemos forma de hacer lo que hizo Calcazar, así que tendremos que dar paz al hermano Ignilf».
languages.original_text: "Calcazar once encountered another of my brothers, who had also become a Wulfen. Calcazar captured him and brought him to Fenris — that is the debt we came here to pay. But we have no way of doing what Calcazar did, so we will have to grant Brother Ignilf peace."

traits.locale_text: «Calcazar una vez se encontró con otro de mis hermanos que también se había convertido en Wulfen. Calcazar logró capturarlo y traerlo a Fenris, y esa es la deuda que vinimos a saldar. Pero no tenemos forma de hacer lo que hizo Calcazar, así que tendremos que dar paz al hermano Ignilf».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Calcazar a autrefois rencontré un autre de mes frères transformé en Wulfen et l'a capturé pour le ramener sur Fenris. Telle est la dette dont nous sommes venus nous acquitter, mais nous n'avons aucun moyen d'imiter Calcazar. Il nous faut donc apporter la paix à frère Ignilf. »
languages.original_text: "Calcazar once encountered another of my brothers, who had also become a Wulfen. Calcazar captured him and brought him to Fenris — that is the debt we came here to pay. But we have no way of doing what Calcazar did, so we will have to grant Brother Ignilf peace."

traits.locale_text: « Calcazar a autrefois rencontré un autre de mes frères transformé en Wulfen et l'a capturé pour le ramener sur Fenris. Telle est la dette dont nous sommes venus nous acquitter, mais nous n'avons aucun moyen d'imiter Calcazar. Il nous faut donc apporter la paix à frère Ignilf. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Calcazar begegnete einmal einem meiner Brüder, der ebenfalls zum Wulfen geworden war. Er fing ihn ein und brachte ihn nach Fenris – um diese Schuld zu begleichen, sind wir hergekommen. Aber wir können nicht tun, was Calcazar getan hat, und darum müssen wir Bruder Ignilf Frieden bringen."
languages.original_text: "Calcazar once encountered another of my brothers, who had also become a Wulfen. Calcazar captured him and brought him to Fenris — that is the debt we came here to pay. But we have no way of doing what Calcazar did, so we will have to grant Brother Ignilf peace."

traits.locale_text: "Calcazar begegnete einmal einem meiner Brüder, der ebenfalls zum Wulfen geworden war. Er fing ihn ein und brachte ihn nach Fenris – um diese Schuld zu begleichen, sind wir hergekommen. Aber wir können nicht tun, was Calcazar getan hat, und darum müssen wir Bruder Ignilf Frieden bringen."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Calcazar bir keresinde Börü olan kardeşlerimden biriyle karşılaşmıştı. Onu yakalayıp Fenris'e getirdi. Buraya bu borcu ödemek için geldik. Calcazar'ın yaptığını yapamayacağımız için Kardeşim İgnilf'i huzura kavuşturmalıyız."
languages.original_text: "Calcazar once encountered another of my brothers, who had also become a Wulfen. Calcazar captured him and brought him to Fenris — that is the debt we came here to pay. But we have no way of doing what Calcazar did, so we will have to grant Brother Ignilf peace."

traits.locale_text: "Calcazar bir keresinde Börü olan kardeşlerimden biriyle karşılaşmıştı. Onu yakalayıp Fenris'e getirdi. Buraya bu borcu ödemek için geldik. Calcazar'ın yaptığını yapamayacağımız için Kardeşim Ignilf'i huzura kavuşturmalıyız."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
